name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Priorities & Notebook by Attention to Detail

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab experience for focusing on priorities and a handy notebook. Brought to you by AttentionToDetail.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New Tab productivity tool with top priority, task list, and note pad (auto-saves and downloadable) for notes, ideas, and reminders. Brought to you by AttentionToDetail.com. 

It's an all-one in space for productivity and prioritization. 

The TOP PRIORTY is your "One Big Thing" to accomplish this day/week/year. 

The task list is for your top priorities of your day or project. Check them off as you complete them. 

The Notepad-style field is a convenient place to jot down ideas, project notes, and quick reminders to avoid the "Now, what was I doing?" moments. 

It also has inspirational and educational quotes, date, and time. 

100% free. Give it a try and enjoy improved productivity.
